price: (30) Say, "Have you considered: if your water was to become sunken [into the earth], then who could bring you flowing water?"
arabic: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِنۡ أَصۡبَحَ مَآؤُكُمۡ غَوۡرٗا فَمَن يَأۡتِيكُم بِمَآءٖ مَّعِينِۭ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qul ara-aytum in aṣbaḥa māukum ghawran faman yatīkum bimāin maʿīnin
